13:12:24</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
var tx = inputs.tx
var token = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_token') token.get(tx.token)
var cmd = 'cd ' + gs.getProperty('x_snc_hspoke.hcli_home') + ' && node hcli token mint'
if (token.token_id) { cmd = cmd + ' --tokenid ' + token.token_id } if (tx.amount) { cmd = cmd + ' --amount ' + tx.amount } if (tx.metadata) { cmd = cmd + " --metadata '" + tx.metadata +"'" }
k = tx.sign_with.toString().split(',')
for (i = 0; i < k.length; i++) { kk = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_key') kk.get(k[i]) cmd = cmd + ' --sign ' + kk.public_key }
outputs.cmd = cmd
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value 13:13:44</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
var tx = inputs.tx
try { tx.output = inputs.stdout;
output = JSON.parse(inputs.stdout)
tx.transaction_id = output.resp.transactionId tx.transaction_hash = output.resp.transactionHash
tx.serials = output.receipt.serials
if (output.receipt.serials.toString() != "") { var nft = new GlideRecord("x_snc_hspoke_nft") nft.initialize() nft.name = output.receipt.serials.toString() + "@" + tx.token.token_id.toString() nft.serial = output.receipt.serials.toString() nft.token = tx.token nft.insert() }
if (output.receipt.status == 'SUCCESS') { tx.status = 'completed' tx.hedera_status = output.receipt.status } else { throw Error("Hedera status is not success") }
} catch (e) { tx.out_parsing_log = e.toString() tx.hedera_status = output.error.status tx.status = 'failed' } finally { tx.update() }
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_element_mapping action="delete_multiple" 13:13:53</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
var tx = inputs.tx
var token = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_token') token.get(tx.token)
var cmd = 'cd ' + gs.getProperty('x_snc_hspoke.hcli_home') + ' && node hcli token mint'
if (token.token_id) { cmd = cmd + ' --tokenid ' + token.token_id } if (tx.amount) { cmd = cmd + ' --amount ' + tx.amount } if (tx.metadata) { cmd = cmd + " --metadata '" + tx.metadata +"'" }
k = tx.sign_with.toString().split(',')
for (i = 0; i < k.length; i++) { kk = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_key') kk.get(k[i]) cmd = cmd + ' --sign ' + kk.public_key }
outputs.cmd = cmd
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value 13:13:53</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
var tx = inputs.tx
try { tx.output = inputs.stdout;
output = JSON.parse(inputs.stdout)
tx.transaction_id = output.resp.transactionId tx.transaction_hash = output.resp.transactionHash
tx.serials = output.receipt.serials
if (output.receipt.serials.toString() != "") { var nft = new GlideRecord("x_snc_hspoke_nft") nft.initialize() nft.name = output.receipt.serials.toString() + "@" + tx.token.token_id.toString() nft.serial = output.receipt.serials.toString() nft.token = tx.token nft.insert() }
if (output.receipt.status == 'SUCCESS') { tx.status = 'completed' tx.hedera_status = output.receipt.status } else { throw Error("Hedera status is not success") }
} catch (e) { tx.out_parsing_log = e.toString() tx.hedera_status = output.error.status tx.status = 'failed' } finally { tx.update() }
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_element_mapping action="delete_multiple" query="id=b66cb0281b7d4190c5efa6c8b04bcb5e"/><sys_element_mapping action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><field>stdout</field><id>b66cb0281b7d4190c5efa6c8b04bcb5e</id><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-17 13:13:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>8b6cb0281b7d4190c5efa6c8b04bcb73</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-17 13:13:53</sys_updated_on><table>var__m_sys_hub_step_ext_input_b66cb0281b7d4190c5efa6c8b04bcb5e</table><value>{{step[ad17f267-8ae9-420f-9d5e-b315861df533].stdout}}</value></sys_element_mapping><sys_element_mapping action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><field>tx</field><id>b66cb0281b7d4190c5efa6c8b04bcb5e</id><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-17 13:13:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>4f6cb0281b7d4190c5efa6c8b04bcb73</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-17 13:13:53</sys_updated_on><table>var__m_sys_hub_step_ext_input_b66cb0281b7d4190c5efa6c8b04bcb5e</table><value>{{action.tx}}</value></sys_element_mapping><sys_element_mapping action="delete_multiple" query="table=var__m_sys_flow_step_definition_input_106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7^id=b66cb0281b7d4190c5efa6c8b04bcb5e"/><sys_hub_step_ext_input action="delete_multiple" query="model=b66cb0281b7d4190c5efa6c8b04bcb5e^sys_idNOT IN0b6cb0281b7d4190c5efa6c8b04bcb61,cb6cb0281b7d4190c5efa6c8b04bcb68"/><sys_hub_step_ext_input action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes>element_mapping_provider=com.glide.flow_design.action.data.FlowDesignVariableMapper,uiType=string,uiTypeLabel=String</attributes><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {
